author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 30-year-old woman of Athanoorpatty made an attempt to kill herself and her five children by consuming soft drinks laced with pesticide. However, all the six were rescued and admitted to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital and were out of danger.

Lakshmanan, a mason, was married to Parameswari. The couple has four daughters and one son. On Wednesday evening, when Parameswari returned home after work, her husband had allegedly beaten her in an inebriated condition. Upset over this, Parameswari decided to go her mother’s house in Belur along with the children. On their way to Belur on Thursday morning, she bought cool drinks and laced it with pesticide and gave it to children and consumed it herself. They took an autorickshaw to Belur. Upon reaching home, she informed her mother. Later, they were taken to Government Hospital in Vazhapadi and then to Salem GH. They were said to be out of danger.
title: Woman attempts to kill children, self
